name: theme-nhsla-nightingale
description: Moodle theme for NHS Leadership Academy using nightingale-core

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./style && cat style/main.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path scss/ --include-path node_modules/ --output-style expanded > style/main.css
scripts.watch: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path scss/ --include-path node_modules/ style/main.scss --watch

author: NHS Leadership Academy
